title: Just came back, is Riven still good?
body: Is riven still good, at top and preferably mid. Thanks for input!

replies.body:
She has 4 dashes, a knock up, a stun, a mega shield and no mana...... she would need a whole rework for her to not be broken

short answer: yes
Agreed, she will always be good because of how broken her kit is.
I hate anyone who plays that broken cancer in midlane.
Thanks, gonna redownload LoL then wreck some guys mid. Wonder what I decayed to. Time to get back to Gold!
Maybe if her shield and stun scaled off AP instead of AD she would be balanced. ;P
